articles.author: ET HealthWorld
articles.title: Asia-Pacific countries sound alarm and commit to tackling antimicrobial resistance - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: ​AMR is a rising threat to health and development globally and to countries and areas of the WHO South-East Asia and Western Pacific Regions - home to nearly half of the world's population. In 2019, AMR was the cause of an estimated 7,00,000 deaths in the two…
articles.content: Geneva: Health leaders from countries and areas of the World Health Organisation (WHO) South-East Asia and Western Pacific Regions sounded the alarm and committed to work together to more effectively… [+4575 chars]
